title: ‘It’s easy to hate the Yankees’: Sonny Gray said Red Sox rival was ‘factor’ in trade decision
author: Aidan Buchanan
bullets: Boston Red Sox "I never wanted to go there in the first place," Gray told reporters of his trade to New York in 2017.
Sonny Gray was a member of the Yankees in 2017 and 2018 (Jim McIsaac/Getty Images).
Sonny Gray is off to a strong start in trying to gain Boston fans’ respect, as he has made it clear he already has a distaste for the Red Sox rival, the New York Yankees.

title: Patriots’ patchwork offensive line stands tall without Will Campbell, Jared Wilson
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots “I told them I had full faith in them.
" The shorthanded Patriots took care of business against the Giants on Monday.

title: Wu speaks out as Boston joins lawsuit against Trump administration over homelessness support
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News More than 1,100 Bostonians could become homeless this winter due to new funding requirements, Mayor Michelle Wu said.
A new resident of Pine Street Inn's permanent supportive housing project in Jamaica Plain holds the the keys to his new unit.
Pine Street Inn opened the largest such housing project in New England this year.
